trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Lancaster
There were no other sightings in Lancaster on or around July 20th 2009
divs: sighting detailsi woke up because a neighboring farm's cows were being loud and looked out of the window when i went to use the bathroom. i noticed a blurry comet-like light that appeared to be very, very slowly moving it's position. it looked very high, as if in orbit. i wasn't convinced that it wasn't a star at first, but noticed an occasional red blink of light around the edge of it. i also noticed tiny lights (maybe satellites?) moving around the sky, too. it could have possibly been a large star w\atmospheric distortion making it look like there were lights blinking around it, but the tiny satellite-like lights moving in the vicinity of it made me wonder... plus the subtle way it moved... very tiny movements. very creepy. i tried to visualize it from the edge of my bathroom's window pane to see if it was in fact moving, and it was. a hover-like movement. i woke up my husband and we watched it for a while from our bedroom balcony. he said it was the space station and went back to bed! i totally disagreed since it was so bright. i watched it for about 30 minutes and went to bed, too. i looked online to see if anyone had reported the same thing, but no one has.
